gitCommit.subject: Add fade‑in animation for mobile backdrop and simplify its rendering
gitCommit.body:
Add fade‑in animation for mobile backdrop and simplify its rendering

- Introduce `.mobileBackdropVisible` class with `opacity: 1` and `pointer-events: auto` plus a transition, while the base `.mobileBackdrop` starts hidden (`opacity: 0`, `pointer‑events: none`).
- Apply the new class conditionally in `App.tsx` via a single `<div>` whose class list now includes `${styles.mobileBackdrop} ${showMobileSidebar() ? styles.mobileBackdropVisible : ''}` instead of wrapping the element in a `<Show>` block.
- Keep the backdrop styling inside the mobile media query, ensuring the transition only runs on screens ≤ 768 px.

gitCommit.subject: Add fade‑in animation for mobile backdrop and simplify its rendering
gitCommit.body:
Add fade‑in animation for mobile backdrop and simplify its rendering

- Introduce `.mobileBackdropVisible` class with `opacity: 1` and `pointer-events: auto` plus a transition, while the base `.mobileBackdrop` starts hidden (`opacity: 0`, `pointer‑events: none`).
- Apply the new class conditionally in `App.tsx` via a single `<div>` whose class list now includes `${styles.mobileBackdrop} ${showMobileSidebar() ? styles.mobileBackdropVisible : ''}` instead of wrapping the element in a `<Show>` block.
- Keep the backdrop styling inside the mobile media query, ensuring the transition only runs on screens ≤ 768 px.

webServer.command: rm -rf ./data-e2e && mkdir -p ./data-e2e && TEST_OAUTH=1 TEST_FAST_RATE_LIMIT=1 DATA_DIR=./data-e2e make dev > ./data-e2e/server.log 2>&1

specs.title: selecting multiple lines and clicking Checkbox converts all lines to task list
clicking numbered list button while inside numbered list toggles it off
clicking bullet list button while inside bullet list toggles it off
clicking checkbox button while inside task list toggles it off (unwraps to paragraphs)
selecting multiple lines and clicking numbered list wraps all in one list
selecting multiple lines and clicking bullet list wraps all in one list
clicking checkbox on regular text creates a task list
clicking checkbox on bullet list converts to task list
selecting multiple task list items and clicking checkbox toggles all off
converting numbered list to task list preserves all items
converting bullet list to numbered list works
converting numbered list to bullet list works
converting task list to numbered list works
selection is preserved through all list type transitions
underline formatting is preserved when switching to markdown mode
task list only highlights checkbox button, not bullet or numbered list buttons
bullet list only highlights bullet button, not checkbox or numbered buttons
numbered list only highlights numbered button, not checkbox or bullet buttons
navigating to non-existent page shows appropriate error or handles gracefully
navigating to non-existent workspace shows error
privacy page accessible without login
terms page accessible without login
network error during save shows error message
editing same page in two tabs - last writer wins
empty page title is handled
very long title is handled
special characters in title are handled
WYSIWYG editor renders code blocks correctly
toolbar lifecycle: hidden -> visible on selection -> hidden on blur
toolbar appears on double-click word selection
changing language updates settings page labels immediately
changing language in settings updates UI without refresh
